original_text: When you go to war against your enemies and see horses and chariots and an army greater than yours, do not be afraid of them, because the Lord your God, who brought you up out of Egypt, will be with you.
korean_text: 네가 나가서 적군과 싸우려 할 때에 말과 병거와 백성이 너보다 많음을 볼지라도 그들을 두려워하지 말라 애굽 땅에서 너를 인도하여 내신 네 하나님 여호와께서 너와 함께 하시느니라

sentences.original_text: When you go to war against your enemies
and an army greater than yours
sentences.korean_translation: 네军队보다 더 큰 군대를 보더라도

sentences.original_text: do not be afraid of them
who brought you up out of Egypt
